Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Sunitinib malate is approved to treat adults with:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Gastrointestinal stromal tumor. It is used in patients whose condition has become worse while taking imatinib mesylate or who are not able to take it.
Pancreatic neuroendocrine tumor. It is used in patients with progressive neuroendocrine tumors that cannot be removed by surgery or have spread.

Renal cell carcinoma (a type of kidney cancer). It is used:in patients with advanced canceras adjuvant therapy in patients who have had a nephrectomy (surgery to remove the kidney) and have a high risk that the cancer will come back

Section.Para: Sunitinib malate is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
